c74object.name: sadam.stat
c74object.digest: Get mean and standard deviation of a number sequence
c74object.description:
sadam.stat
will compute the mean, the standard deviation and the minimum and maximum values of a sequence of numbers. With no arguments it will compute these values using all the numbers it received (like the
mean
object) while by declaring a fixed buffer size N it will do the calculations only on the last N entries.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: The numbers (either int or float) to be taken into account.

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: The current size of the dataset.

objarg.name: Dataset size
objarg.description: The maximum size of the dataset. If this value is not set, the buffer will grow infinitely.

method.name: bang
method.description: Output the mean, standard deviation, minimum and maximum values and dataset size.

method.name: size
method.description: Sets the maximum size of the dataset. If 0, the dataset will grow infinitely.

example.caption: The mean, the standard deviation and the minimum and maximum values of a sequence of numbers.
